pullRequest.title: SONARJAVA-3386 FP on S2187 when test class is a JUnit4 test class also inheriting from a JUnit3 TestCase

commit.message: SONARJAVA-3386 FP on S2187 when test class is a JUnit4 test class also inheriting from a JUnit3 TestCase

nodes.bodyText: What exactly are you checking for with .endsWith("Test")? Would it make sense to also check for *Test, *Tests and *TestCase?
